settings.heading: What is Modern Artz?
settings.row_content:
Modern Artz
is an online platform showcasing custom artwork created by Kenny Konglomerate. We specialize in curating custom artwork for customers all around the globe in attempts to bridge the gap between hip hop and modern art.

settings.heading: How can I purchaseartwork from your website?
settings.row_content: To purchase artwork, simply visit the Art Gallery section of our website. Browse through our collections, select the artwork you love, select a material and size. Then, click the add to cart button and follow the checkout process.

settings.heading: Do you offer customart commissions?
settings.row_content:
Yes, we do offer custom art commissions. Please visit our Custom page to learn more about
the process and how to request a custom piece of artwork.

settings.heading: What payment methodsdo you accept?
settings.row_content: We currently accept payments via credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay and other payment methods. All payments are processed securely through our website.

settings.heading: What is yourshipping policy?
settings.row_content:
Our shipping policies may vary depending on if the product purchased is custom or from our art gallery. Shipping time is estimated but not guaranteed. At this time custom
artwork and items from our art gallery are expected to arrive within 7-15 business days. Holidays and surplus of orders may have an effect on shipping time.

settings.heading: Can I return orexchange artwork if I'm not satisfied?
settings.row_content: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase however at this time all sales are final for custom artwork and items from the art gallery.

settings.heading: How can I contactcustomer support?
settings.row_content: If you have any questions, concerns, or need assistance, please visit our abotu us  page for various ways to get in touch with our customer support team. We are here to help!

settings.heading: Do you offerinternational shipping?
settings.row_content: Yes, we offer international shipping to customers around the world. Shipping time may vary upon country. Please view your order at Checkout to see more information on Currency Exchange and Shipping Rates.

settings.heading: Are the artworks onyour website limited editions?
settings.row_content: Some of our artworks may be available in limited editions. Details about edition sizes and availability can be found in the product descriptions on each artwork's page.
